text: Moses Osirizir Araziba kamagh mɨkeme, e gumaziba bar Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn mangɨva, egh ikuvigham. Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨkeme, “Gumazir ter ighuvimɨn duiba God ghaze, me gumazir kuraba.” Ezɨ kamaghɨn Krais en akuravaghasa ziar kam ini, “gumazir kuram.” Egha ziar kam bangɨn a uam e ini.
